# excsv

A command-line utility for quickly inspecting CSV files 


Install this tool using `pip`:



```bash
pip install excsv
```




## Notes

2024-03-14: just a placeholder for now




## Dev and Testing


```sh
# install locally
$ pip install -e .


# run all tests
$ pytest

# run just alpha tests
$ pytest -m 'alpha'


# skip alpha tests
$ pytest -m 'not alpha'
```
